Our Peals and Quarters

Our PEAL :-)
SCACR
9 February 2002 (3h)
5056 Bob Major
(Comp: A Pink)
1 Marian Lawrence
2 Angela Dawes
3 Jo E Faircloth
4 Alan P Turner
5 Simon G Lawrence
6 Stephen Chambers
7 Paul Franks
8 Alan D Pink (C)

First peal: 3.
1st in method for all except conductor.

Rung for Queenie.
 
Quarters
19 May 2002 (43 mins)
1260 Single Oxford Bob Triples
1 Ann Ekins+
2 Stephen Chambers*
3 Marian Lawrence
4 Jo Faircloth*
5 Simon Lawrence
6 Paul Franks
7 Alan Turner (C)
8 Andrew Colquhoun*

* First in method
+ First of triples

Rung to celebrate the marriage of Paul Dennison and
Tracie Robinson at Ringmer the previous day.
